channel.title: Need help changing client backround please?
channel.description: I have a kingdomhearts client backround that I would like to change to a choice of my own, but the dimensions are 1600x1200 on the orginal picture? what I do?

item.title: Need help changing client backround please?
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Soul2 -Dark Soul-
item.source: Need help changing client backround please?

item.title: Need help changing client backround please?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

I think it has to be the same dementions, although I’m not possitive. To be safe I would just make it the same though, or at least make a backup of the old title just in case.
Here’s how to change it if you don’t know.
Open your sprites folder and find the image of what the backround already looks like. Right click and edit it to the picture of your choosing.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 01:20:46 am[/size][hr][quote=“tehsng, post:9, topic:287963”]Any size you want works…[/quote]
Really?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help changing client backround please?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Ehh, I still don’t see the problem.
-is the image that you would like to add 1600x1200
-is the image that you would like to replace 1600x1200

This also belongs in the client help section, if you can’t get your client image to the size you need resizing it might make it too blurry, you’re better off making your own.

Read full topic
